mapper.select: SELECT user_id, login_name AS loginname, password, user_name AS fullname, del_flag FROM sys_user WHERE login_name = #{loginname} AND password = #{password};
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET login_date = getdate() where user_id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT user_name as username , email,remark,user_id FROM sys_user WHERE user_type != 00 and del_flag = 0
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dept}, '%')
AND remark LIKE CONCAT('%', #{role}, '%')
